adventure_overview: Laughing makes you feel good, and when you laugh others may start laughing, too. With just a smile, you can meet a new friend, make someone else smile, and create a happy feeling in yourself and other people. In this Adventure, you’ll find lots of ways to smile and laugh. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: Think about what makes you laugh. Discuss these with your den or family.

activities.name: Blank Canvas Tales
activities.description: Cub Scouts participate in a word-play game.

activities.name: Comedy Corner
activities.description: Cub Scouts grab and read jokes out loud to den.

activities.name: Laughter Unleashed
activities.description: Cub Scouts write down things that make them laugh and share with the den.

requirements.text: Play charades with your den or family.

activities.name: Charade Champions
activities.description: Cub Scouts play a game of charades.

requirements.text: Have a “funniest joke contest” with your den or family.

activities.name: Funniest Joke Showdown
activities.description: Cub Scouts participate in a joke contest.

requirements.text: Practice “run-ons” with your den or family.

activities.name: Run-On Rendezvous
activities.description: Cub Scouts practice and perform run-ons.
